[Pride and Progress], [The Right Stuff], San Francisco No. 45, 12/9/1986
[Pride and Progress], [The Right Stuff], San Francisco No. 45, 12/9/1986

Pride and Progress: San Francisco1. With Joseph Durant and Cheryl RosenthalCOMMERCIAL:Professional GlassCOMMERCIAL:Dionne Warwick:San Francisco AIDS Foundation2.Pacific Bell must pay 3 million dollar settlement due to gay employment discrimination, Footage of Jean O'Leary from NGRA3.AB1 bill prevents bias on job discrimination4.Salvation Army works and provides funds towards anti-gay legislation, Footage of Steven Rasher, GGBA5.Law-suit has been served to Women's Training Center for sex bias6.Gay Games Board of Directors presented awards to volunteers, Footage of speech by Rikki Streiker, GGII Treasurer7. Interview with Karen Thompson who talks about the denial of her rights to take care of her diabled partner8.Interview with Paul Wotman who talks about living wills regarding gay and lesbian partnerships9.Dr. Harvey Thompson, an early educator of AIDS health, died.10.Sally Gearhart talks about her only religious expeienceCOMMERCIAL:Professional Glass11.Mario Mandelli:GCN Fundraising12.Carol Migden, Chair S.F. Demo Party: GCN Fundraising13.Nello Carlini:GCN Fundraising14.Pride and Progress, with Doug Kimball, Football results of San Francisco Trojans defeat over The Deputies15.Tom Matthews talks about male circumcision16.Closing Credits
The Right Stuff:1. With Mario MandelliCOMMERCIAL:Rip Taylor: San Francisco AIDS Foundation2.This Week in Gay History with Kevin Sweeney3.Interview with Eric Gilbert who talks about "Gay Comix"4.Footage and interviews from a Lily Thomlin and Jane Wagner book signingCOMMERCIAL: Baybrick Inn5. Interview with Joann Loulan author of "Lesbian Sex"COMMERCIAL:Baybrick Inn6.Karen Ripley:GCN Fundraising7.Danny Williams:GCN FundraisingCOMMERCIAL:Blazing Redheads8.Joan Rivers Impersonator: GCN Fundraising9. Jimmy Romer, City Gossip10.Closing Credits
Program content: Mario Mondelli 1:02, Ripp Taylor PSA on AIDS 0:23, Mario Mondelli into Lilly Tomlin and Jane Wagner 3:11, Mario Mondelli 0:24 into Joann Lovlan Lesbian Sex inter. 5:34
